dct_title_s: US consumer expenditures on entertainment and recreation by market area, 2021-2026
dct_description_sm: Consumer spending on entertainment and recreation in the United States as calculated for 2021 and projected for 2026. Data are provided at the level of designated market areas (DMAs) as defined by The Nielsen Company.
